meta.title: NouVet | {{familyName}}
family.joined: You've joined the family! Last step is for the inviter to verify it's indeed you who requested to join.
family.has-pending-multiple: There are {{pendingNumber}} users asking to join the family.
family.has-pending-one: There is a user asking to join the family.
invite-card-heading: Have your partner already registered? Join them!
invite-card-description: Your pets are happier with more humans around! Share the care for your pets with the loved ones.
account-menu.pwa-description: Use NouVet without the internet, making the access faster and enabling more features.
family-invite.headline: Sharing is caring
family-invite.subheadline: Your pets are happier with more humans around! Share the care for your pets with the loved ones.
family-invite.join: Want to join another user instead?
family-invite.info-consent:
By accepting another user into your family, you allow them to see and modify your pets information, including medical history or medications you may have saved.

You can always revoke the access from invited users.
family-invite.qr-description: Let another person you want to invite to scan this code with their phone camera
family-invite.waiting-people: People who followed the link will appear here for your approval.
family-invite.invite-share-text: I invite you to a group to share the care of our pets! Join using this link.
family-invite.join-instruction: Scan the QR-code, created by your partner in their NouVet app.
family-invite.scan-denied: Camera is not available. You can use the camera app of your device to scan the code, or ask the inviter to share a direct link instead.
family-invite.join-link: Open the invitation link in your browser
family-invite.join-failure: Open the invitation link in your browser
family-invite.expired-description: Seems like the QR code is a little brokey. But that's alright! Just ask your partner to create a new one!
family-invite.join-success: You are now part of the family!
